name: emp-job-queue
description: EmProps Job Queue System - TypeScript rebuild of emp-redis

scripts.machines:basic:up: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && docker compose --profile expose-ports up
scripts.machines:basic:up:build: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && docker compose --profile expose-ports up --build
scripts.machines:basic:local:up: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && cp .env.local.dev .env.local && docker compose --profile expose-ports up
scripts.machines:basic:local:up:build: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && cp .env.local.dev .env.local && docker compose --profile expose-ports up --build
scripts.machines:basic:up:no-ports: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && docker compose up
scripts.machines:basic:status: echo '🔍 Basic Machine Status Check' && curl -s http://localhost:9090/health | jq || echo '❌ Health check failed'
scripts.machines:basic:comfyui: echo '🎨 ComfyUI Status Check' && curl -s http://localhost:8188/ | head -n 5 || echo '❌ ComfyUI not responding'
scripts.machines:basic:ports: echo '🌐 Checking Basic Machine Ports:' && echo '  Health (9090):' && nc -z localhost 9090 && echo '    ✅ Open' || echo '    ❌ Closed' && echo '  ComfyUI (8188):' && nc -z localhost 8188 && echo '    ✅ Open' || echo '    ❌ Closed'
